channel.title: DMZ host [help]
channel.description:
Okay i have the option to select DMZ host on my verizon router.
I was told this automatically opens up all ports and you don't have to portforward.
I did this, putting my public IP address into the DMZ host, and my server will still not go online
PLEASE SOMEONE HELP. EITHER VIA MSN OR TEAMVIEWER.
MSN: Mod_GH@hotmail.com
Thankss,
